title: demoted from gold to silver
body: im gold 5 and i already lost 4 games in a row with 0 lp how many games ive left

replies.body:
*Lew* provided some great insight on this and is 100% correct. Be sure to check out our [Ranked Play FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204010760-Ranked-Play-FAQ) for a complete rundown of the ranked system and its inner workings.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
It all depends on your MMR and if its lower than the current division's average then you always have a risk of demotion whenever you lose a game at 0 LP.
